goal.ch:
本課程是中文授課。
訓練學生如何針對RC結構物做耐震設計，以及設計預力混凝土結構。
goal.en:
This course is taught in Chinese.
Training students on how to conduct seismic design for reinforced concrete structures (RC) and design prestressed concrete structures.

outline.ch:
1a. 預應力混凝土結構設計 [1]
（1）材料性質
（2）受軸向荷載構件的反應
（3）受彎矩構件的反應
1b. 期中考試
2a. 鋼筋混凝土結構的地震設計 [2]
2b. 期末考試
3.  選一相關主題作簡報
outline.en:
1a. Design of prestressed concrete structures [1]
(1) Material properties
(2) Response of members subjected to axial load
(3) Response of members subjected to flexure
1b. Mid-term exam
2a. Seismic design of RC structures [2]
2b. Final-term exam
3. Present selected topics

textbook.ch:
[1] M.P. Collins and D. Mitchell, Prestressed Concrete Structures, 1991, Prentice Hall. Chapters 1- 6. (老師提供講義)
[2] 土木406-112 鋼筋混凝土學， 2023，科技圖書。第十章 耐震設計。
textbook.en:
[1] M.P. Collins and D. Mitchell, Prestressed Concrete Structures, 1991, Prentice Hall. Chapters 1- 6. (老師提供講義)
[2] 土木406-112 鋼筋混凝土學， 2023，科技圖書。第十章 耐震設計。

instructMethod.ch:
講授
研討
實習/實驗

gradMethod.ch:
期中考試占30％
期末考試占30％
作業占30％
簡報占10％
gradMethod.en:
Mid-term exam 30％
Final-term exam 30％
Home Work 30％
Presentation 10％

flexDiscription.ch: 未完成或有增加之授課內容，則以彈性教學週作補充。
flexDiscription.en: Any unfinished or additional course content will be supplemented through flexible teaching weeks.

、


力學及結構工程
domain.en:
專業基礎學科


、


力學及結構工程

ch.competencies: 策劃及執行專題研究之能力
研發創新及獨立解決問題之能力
跨領域協調整合之能力
國際觀及永續發展理念
領導、管理及規劃之能力
終身自我學習成長之能力

en.competencies: The Ability of Planning and Implementing Research Projects
The Ability in Writing Technical Papers
The Ability in Research, Innovation, and Problem Solving
The Ability of Interdisciplinary Integration and Coordination
International Perspective and Concept of Sustainable Development

ch: 系所:限土木工程學系碩士班、土木工程學系博士班。
系所:限土木工程學系。年級:限四年級。
en: Department:MSc in Civil Engineering、PhD in Civil Engineering only.
Department:Department of Civil Engineering only.Year:Fourth Year only.
